item.title: Desert Sands USD Job Updates January 23, 2019
item.description: Desert Sands Unified School District closed two transfer only positions and made a Speech-Language Pathologist position available. The posting date for the position is listed as July 5th 2018. Added: Speech-Language Pathologist Removed: Administrative Assistant/Bilingual (CWA) (Transfer Only) Paraeducator/Special Education (Hoover) (Transfer Only)
